title: Electric PE - 1 charge moves to midpt of other 2

content.question: Three point charges are initially arranged at the vertices of an equilateral triangle, as shown in the figure. The two point charges at the top vertices each have a charge <math alttext="negative Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>, and the point charge at the bottom vertex has a charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mpadded></math>. The positive point charge is then moved to its final position, at the midpoint between the two negative point charges. What is the ratio of the final electric potential energy to the initial electric potential energy of the three-point charge system?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
